remarks: The concatenation of two words is a function over the half-open integer range having the sum of the lengths of the word as length.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Mar-2018.)
statement: ccatvalfn $p |- ( ( A e. Word V /\ B e. Word V ) -> ( A concat B ) Fn ( 0 ..^ ( ( # ` A ) + ( # ` B ) ) ) ) $.
